mapper.insert: insert into activities (created_at, log_type,user_login,data_field, log_message) values (#{createdAt}, #{type}, #{author}, #{data}, #{message})
mapper.select: SELECT l.created_at as "createdAt", l.log_type as "type", l.user_login as "author", l.data_field as "data", l.log_message as "message" FROM activities l
